title: Ricardo11
author: Ricardo11
content: On-chain data analytics platform Arkham Intelligence recently revealed the combined bitcoin holdings owned by Elon Musk's company, Tesla and SpaceX. According to Arkham, Elon Musk currently has $1.30 billion worth of bitcoins between his Tesla and SpaceX reserves, which equates to about 19822.27 BTC coins at current market value. This large Bitcoin stash indicates Elon Musk's bullish position on Bitcoin.Arkham reported that Tesla held $780 million worth of BTC in March, and SpaceX has a bitcoin treasure chest worth about $560 million.    image source Elon Musk also revealed SpaceX's Bitcoin holdings in 2021 at "The B Word" online conference. ""I own Bitcoin, Tesla owns Bitcoin, SpaceX owns Bitcoin,"" Musk said.News link: https://u.today/heres-how-much-bitcoin-btc-elon-musks-tesla-and-spacex-currently-hodls

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: I search google on this one, but i only see the latest topic/article from Utoday mentioned by OP, nothing from other sources, and looks like this is old news. So i think the article is only to hype the price, unless there is a recent announcement/post (on X) of Elon regarding his own and his companies' bitcoin holdings, i can say nothing's new. Most people here know he sold most of Tesla's btc's holdings wayback 2022.

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: Tesla is a public company so any BTC (along with other holdings) must be disclosed and are public.SpaceX is private so there might be some coins controlled by them that we don't know about.Either way, without showing proof of addresses and proof they control those addresses it's all just a guess as is most of what Arkham puts out.-Dave
